evidence.claim: Ozark Total Healthcare uses FHIR for interoperability and data exchange in their health services.
The organization adheres to HIPAA standards and implements HL7 protocols for clinical data exchanges.
They utilize X12 transaction sets for billing and claims processing, streamlining the EDI processes.
Ozark Total Healthcare integrates with various EHR systems using HL7 standards, ensuring consistency in health records management.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged with X12 and EDI in healthcare; likely to benefit from API automation.
